item.description:
When all the noise is silenced
The meetings adjourned
The lists lay aside
And the wild iris blooms by itself
In the dark forest
What still pulls on your soul?
In the silence between your heartbeats
Hides a summons
Do you hear it?

I SAW, Inspiring the Soul at Work, is a workshop that provides an opportunity to hear that summons, to remember what you hold sacred and where your passion lie.

Stories will be the vehicle for accessing these deeper truths, for gaining personal insight, for passing along wisdom, for connect to others, and building community.

Our facilitator Birute Regine will be guiding us through this reflective writing working shop that asks who you are and what you care about. In this one-day writing workshop you will be connecting to your passion, taking time to look at what you are doing and why you are dong it, co-creating a personal story with others, a story that you will share at the end of the day, and a story you take home with you. In the course of the day, you will develop deep listening skills, listen to the unconscious speak, and integrate what is important to you in your life in a novel way. Join me for an intense day of surprise and wonder.

Come a 8:30 because we will start promptly at 9:00 and end by 6:00. Starting and stopping on time is important to this process. Bring a journal and your favorite art materials. Wear comfortable clothes. Lunch will be served.

For more information about Birute Regine visit www.ironbutterflies.com or www.soulatwork.com
item.name: One Day Writing Workshop - Reflecting and Connecting to your Passion
